team.title: <0>Our</0> team
team.text: Since 2012 RAFT builds digital solutions helping technology companies to reduce cost of development.

description: Microsoft requested an automated way of tracking Azure-related KPIs and SLAs for meeting the monthly targets. KPIs were based on Azure logs and multiple other data sources. Before implementing the automation, all reporting was done manually.

We created a data pipeline using C# and .NET that processed different data sources, including Azure operations logs, 10Tb of logs per day. Our team used distributed processing via DataStudio and Scope (internal Microsoft tools) to process this amount of data.

American Well needed technical expertise for developing Patient Concierge Health Assistant and Mobile Applications. We shaped the required team extensions, developed end-to-end features, established advanced security to support new features, redesigned existing architecture, created a customer feedback processing module, and built a complete mobile customer application.
The client is a world leader in portable ultrasound devices for home use.

Raft engineers helped to significantly improve the user experience for the company’s devices by building a mobile application that is tightly integrated into client’s ecosystem. The app allows providers to get patients’ ultrasound results in real -time while consulting them online. Moms could control their babies’ health without leaving their homes now
Blockchain platform for cryptocurrency trading and asset tokenization.

The RAFT team has established a continuous automated testing process to speed up the release process. For this, a set of E2E tests was developed, as well as testing the blockchain core for fault tolerance.

Gyre, an early-stage startup building a platform for streamers’ collaboration, needed a team of developers experienced in data processing, building web crawlers with Python and Spark, and working with social networks’ APIs. Our team helped Gyre build a team of senior developers and architects to design and launch their MVP. We designed and implemented a Youtube streaming crawler from end to end and developed storage and incremental data processing pipeline.
